verbs.description: [V: ruby] [ARG1: grape pie] my wife paula and i produce red and green seedless table grapes on our 75-acre vineyard our crop is wonderful eaten out - of - hand or in salads paula also uses them in this unusual and tasty pie —salvage island farm fred smeds reedley california dot
